text: Once you learn to quit, it becomes a habit.
author: Vince Lombardi

text: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious.
author: Phillips Brooks

text: The first step in reforming appetite is going from processed food to real food. Then, if you can afford organic or grass-fed, fantastic. But the first step is moving from processed industrial food to the real thing.

text: Knowledge which is divorced from justice, may be called cunning rather than wisdom.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

text: Lay this unto your breast: Old friends, like old swords, still are trusted best.
author: John Webster

text: You can be this super-successful woman who's smart and effective but still feminine. When I worked in finance, I didn't always think that was possible.
author: Ruzwana Bashir

text: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success.

text: He conquers who endures.
author: Persius

text: I'm always trying to find brain food and indulge in knowledge that's gonna be useful.
author: Big Boi

text: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.
author: John W. Gardner

text: As sure as the spring will follow the winter, prosperity and economic growth will follow recession.

text: Life is a series of collisions with the future; it is not the sum of what we have been, but what we yearn to be.

text: One of the key elements of human behavior is, humans have a greater fear of loss than enjoyment of success. All the academic studies will show you that the fear of loss of capital is far greater than the enjoyment of gains.

text: Ignorant men raise questions that wise men answered a thousand years ago.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

text: Some for renown, on scraps of learning dote, And think they grow immortal as they quote.
author: Edward Young

text: People say, 'What's the secret to a marriage?' There's no secret - I think you get lucky.

text: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.

text: Woe to the man whose heart has not learned while young to hope, to love - and to put its trust in life.
author: Joseph Conrad

text: Love means to commit yourself without guarantee.
author: Anne Campbell

text: It was the Law of the Sea, they said. Civilization ends at the waterline. Beyond that, we all enter the food chain, and not always right at the top.

text: Winning isn't everything, but it beats anything in second place.
author: William C. Bryant

text: Learning is the beginning of wealth. Learning is the beginning of health. Learning is the beginning of spirituality. Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.

text: Friendship is mutual blackmail elevated to the level of love.
author: Robin Morgan

text: Sound character provides the power with which a person may ride the emergencies of life instead of being overwhelmed by them. Failure is... the highway to success.

text: The older I get the more wisdom I find in the ancient rule of taking first things first. A process which often reduces the most complex human problem to a manageable proportion.

text: Nothing that you have not given away will ever be really yours.
author: C. S. Lewis

text: There's so many things that life is, and no matter how many breakthroughs, trials will exist and we're going to get through it. Just be strong.

text: Personal health is related to self-control and to the worship of life in all its natural beauty - self-control bringing with it happiness, renewed youth, and long life.

text: Success is never final, but failure can be.

text: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
author: John Ruskin

text: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

text: Learning to face reality, refusing refuge in cliches and lies, fighting to find a way out - that's what 'Rehab' is about.

text: My father was a dreamer - my hero. He was a smart, tough guy from Poland, a cutter of lady's handbags, an old socialist-unionist who always considered himself a failure. His big line was: 'Don't end up like me.'

text: Thank you for life, and all the little ups and downs that make it worth living.
author: Travis Barker

text: If you wish to succeed in life, make perseverance your bosom friend, experience your wise counselor, caution your elder brother, and hope your guardian genius.
author: Joseph Addison

text: Personally, I would be delighted if there were a life after death, especially if it permitted me to continue to learn about this world and others, if it gave me a chance to discover how history turns out.

text: Because of the failure of the federal government to enforce federal law, we now have 'banks too big to fail,' unregulated Internet monopoly, and the evisceration of a dispersed and independent media.
author: Paul Craig Roberts

text: Partnering with CNBC will allow Yahoo! Finance to expand its offerings instantly and enhance its position as the most viewed and utilized finance site in the world.
author: Ross Levinsohn

text: The truth is not for all men, but only for those who seek it.
author: Ayn Rand

text: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency. Consistent hard work leads to success. Greatness will come.
author: Dwayne Johnson

text: The resistance that you fight physically in the gym and the resistance that you fight in life can only build a strong character.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

text: Live, so you do not have to look back and say: 'God, how I have wasted my life.'
author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

text: There is a fountain of youth: it is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.
author: Sophia Loren

text: I think this industry can be tough on everyone. You have to surround yourself with supportive people and know when to put your foot down and do what's best for you and your family. The first few years in the music industry can be a steep learning curve, and I've definitely developed a thicker skin!
author: Rebecca Ferguson

text: Life is something to do when you can't get to sleep.
author: Fran Lebowitz

text: I have always believed that it's important to show a new look periodically. Predictability can lead to failure.
author: T. Boone Pickens

text: Call it the Tiger Mom effect: In the business world today, failure is apparently not an option.

text: I have gone from being a 21-year-old with wide eyes to a 24-year-old woman. With success comes a lot of responsibility and power.
author: Vanessa Carlton

text: Real food, I've found, is actually better than dieting.
author: Angelina Jolie

text: We have a list of human rights - right to food, right to shelter, right to health, right to education, many such items which are considered and accepted as bill of rights. These are to be insured to people. So all nations, all societies try to do that.
author: Muhammad Yunus

text: I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
author: Rita Rudner

text: I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everybody.

text: One of the great things personally coming to Hawai'i is my friendship of Jim Nicholson.
author: Dan Fouts

text: Our learning ought to be our lives' amendment, and the fruits of our private study ought to appear in our public behavior.
author: Thomas Nashe

text: Growing up, I had the weird fantasy list: I wanted to be Alice Cooper, Steven Spielberg, and Stan Lee. You have to have almost psychotic drive, because you're going to have years of failure.

text: To live is to change, and to be perfect is to have changed often.
author: John Henry Newman

text: Marriage, in its truest sense, is a partnership of equals, with neither exercising dominion over the other, but, rather, with each encouraging and assisting the other in whatever responsibilities and aspirations he or she might have.
